Message:
Since then, my magic has tried
to devour me everytime I blame
myself for what happened.

But I’ve done my best
to hold it back.

Because if I let this power
consume me, it’ll be the
greatest insult to my master.

This magic that she taught me,
and all her great accomplishments—
I want to share them with someone.

But if I get close to them,
they’re going to end up
like my master...
What do I even want to do?

If only there was someone
who would venture through
this forest to see me...
